name: Assignment Engine
description: Intelligent daily work proposals that handle availability changes and optimize crew utilization.

prd.problemStatement: Creating optimal daily assignments requires balancing workload, skills, availability, and priorities. Manual assignment is time-consuming and suboptimal.
userStories: As a superintendent, I want optimized assignments so that my crew is utilized effectively
As a superintendent, I want the system to handle callouts so that I can quickly reassign work
